 Magnus saw the maximals fire on the preds..."Stop maximals...we are here to 
help you. Please let us. We have brought togeather destrons and preadacons 
alike to help. My word should be enough is you know who I am. " Valtron put 
his hand on his shoulder. "It is for me...." then destructor and the three 
horsmen did the same and so did the two destrons. Sphink and Cherea. They 
hoped the others would follow in this sighn of truce. destructor motioned 
dark mouse and drill bit to follow. As did Sphink to his fellow destrons.
